post.title: Another Judge with Fake Case Law
post.excerpt: This federal judge used an AI and was found to have cited bad case law. Then he fixed it to include the same bad case law. Keep in mind we can’t fire these judges either. https://x.com/ewess92/status/1950564393558913090?s=46&t=gbXFVtdeAqulPOfK2uLh7g
